item.title: About My Blog
item.description:
Thank you for visiting my website!

Machine Learning is the place to record the learning process of machine learning, includes notes and projects.

Penetration is where I document my experience about penetration. I will write some penetrating process and usage of tools for penetration.

Tools is where I record the usage of hardware and software tools including operating systems.

Programming is about tips of little tricks useful when I write code.
